channel.title: Usb flash drive undefined [Solved]
channel.description: Hello there, Im currently trying run latest Whonix 14.0.0.7.4 on KVM hypervisor with usb device and its failed while booting,gateway and workstation both,i made also dist-upgrade and check udisks2 package and seems all needed software already installed,would like to fix this problem for good. Thanks for replies

item.title: Usb flash drive undefined [Solved]
item.dc:creator: bmtkn1
item.description:
Fixed: just set in virt manager settings Usb contrloller USB 2.0
Good day.

Read full topic

Hello there,
Im currently trying run latest Whonix 14.0.0.7.4 on KVM hypervisor with usb device and its failed while booting,gateway and workstation both,i made also dist-upgrade and check udisks2 package and seems all needed software already installed,would like to fix this problem for good.
